channel.title: Courses on Suryajith Chillara
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on Suryajith Chillara

item.title: CS1.301 Algorithm Analysis and Design (Monsoon 2024)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Posted on Moodle Schedule: Lectures: Tuesday and Friday, 10:00 – 11:25, Tutorial: TBA Classroom: TBA Lectures Almost the same as the previous years'. References J. Kleinberg, and E. Tardos (2005), Algorithm Design, Pearson (Addison Wesley). T. H. Cormen, C. E. Leiserson, R. Rivest, and C. Stein, Introduction to Algorithms (third edition, 2009), MIT press and McGraw Hill. S. Dasgupta, C. Papadimitrou, and U.

item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2024)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Nithish Raja, Vidit Jain Schedule: Tuesday and Friday, 14:00 – 15:30 Classroom: H104 Topics Introduction to Polynomial Identity Testing, Univariate Interpolation, Verifying Matrix Multiplication References: Section 7.2 & 7.3 of [1], and Section 1.1 & 1.3 of [2]. DeMillo-Lipton-Schwartzâ€“Zippel lemma, The isolation lemma and Mulmuley, Vazirani, and Vazirani algorithm for matching References: Section 12.4 of [1], Section Moshkovitz’s alternate proof of DLSZ lemma, and Mulmuley-Vazirani-Vazirani ‘87 Randomized routing

item.title: CS1.301 Algorithm Analysis and Design (Monsoon 2023)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Posted on Moodle Schedule: Lectures: Tuesday and Friday, 10:00 – 11:25, Tutorial: Saturday, 12:40 - 13:40 Classroom: H-205 Lectures Almost the same as the previous years'. References J. Kleinberg, and E. Tardos (2005), Algorithm Design, Pearson (Addison Wesley). T. H. Cormen, C. E. Leiserson, R. Rivest, and C. Stein, Introduction to Algorithms (third edition, 2009), MIT press and McGraw Hill. S. Dasgupta, C.

item.title: CS1.503 Mathematical Foundations of Data Science (Monsoon 2023)
item.description: Announcements Instructors: Girish Varma, Suryajith Chillara Teaching assistants: Nithish Raja Schedule: Lectures: Tuesday and Friday, 14:00 – 15:25, Tutorial: Saturday, 12:40 - 13:40 Classroom: Digital classroom, B5 Vindhya Course portal: elearn @ IIIT Hyderabad Tentative topics Estimation from Random Samples Examples in Vote Share surveys, Medical Tests etc. Mathematical Formulation in terms of Random Variables Linearity of Expectation & Tail Bounds Gaussian & Confidence Intervals Predictions, Precision/Recall Curve WWW Graph, Page Rank & Eigenvalues

item.title: CS1.201 Data Structures and Algorithms: Lab (Spring 2023)
item.description: Lab-instructor while Sujit Gujar and Ravi Kiran S were main instructors.

item.title: CS2.201a Computer Systems Organization (Spring 2023)
item.description: Announcements Instructors: Suryajith Chillara and Girish Varma Teaching assistants: Sriram Devata and A Kishore Kumar Schedule: Monday and Tuesday, 14:00 – 15:25 Classroom: H-103 Lectures Part I Introduction to Computer Systems File Class notes References: Chapter 1 of [1] Computer Arithmetic 1 Class notes References: Sections 2.1 and 2.2 of [1] Computer Arithmetic 2 Class notes References: Sections 2.

item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2023)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Amul Agarwal, Kunal Jain, Nithish Raja Schedule: Tuesday and Friday, 15:35 – 17:00 Classroom: H103 Lectures Introduction to Randomized algorithms, RandQS (Includes the list of tentative topics) References: Chapter 1 of [1], Chapter 1 & Section 2.4 of [2] Min-Cut, and Las Vegas & Monte carlo References: Sections 1.1 and 1.2 of [1] and Section 1.4 of [2]. Coupon collector’s problem, Markov Inequality, Chebyshev’s inequality

item.title: CS1.301 Algorithm Analysis and Design (Monsoon 2022)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Posted on Moodle Schedule: Lectures: Wednesday and Saturday, 10:00 – 11:25, Tutorial: Wednesday, 14:00 - 15:00 Classroom: H-105 Lectures Introduction to Algorithm Analysis References: Chapter 2 of [1] Basic Graph Algorithms: BFS and DFS References: Section 3.2 of [1] Basic Graph Algorithms: DFS (contd), and Testing bipartiteness References: Sections 3.3 and 3.4 of [1] Basic Graph Algorithms: Testing bipartiteness, Search algorithms on Directed graphs

item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2022)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Dixit Kumar Garg and S Shodasakshari Vidya Schedule: Monday and Thursday, 11:30 – 12:55 Classroom: SH-2 (2nd floor, C-1 Vindhya) Lectures Introduction to Randomized algorithms, RandQS (Includes the list of tentative topics) References: Chapter 1 of [1], Chapter 1 & Section 2.4 of [2] Min-Cut, and Las Vegas & Monte carlo References: Sections 1.1 and 1.2 of [1] and Section 1.

item.title: Teaching at IIT Bombay
item.description: CS 604 - Combinatorics (Spring 2019) Co instructor with Prof. Sundar Vishwanathan. CS721 - Computational Complexity (Monsoon 2018) Co instructor with Prof. Nutan Limaye.
